title: Online Dental Education Design: Mobile Microlearning-Based Intermediate Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Dental Medicine Knowledge and Understanding of Clinical Terminology
context.additional_context: Need to enhance dental theory education using mobile devices in situations with limited in-person practical training, designed based on online learning models validated during the pandemic.

learning_goals: Learners can explain digital dental imaging interpretation criteria with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply periodontal disease classification systems using microlearning content under three minutes in mobile environments.
Learners can develop dental treatment plan projects (by team) and conduct peer evaluations using online collaboration tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
